title: 砍树插件求配置文件解析
author: cs1000
txt_content:
我把树苗摆成3*3能生长特大的树，但是砍树插件没法砍倒  怎么办、
单棵没有问题  种成一片就不行了 求解决办法

Main:
  Automatic Tree Destruction: true
  Use Permissions: false
  Sapling Replant: true
  Apply Full Tool Damage: true
  Ignore User Placed Blocks: false
  Use mcMMO if Available: true
  Destroy Only Blocks Above: false
  Auto Plant Dropped Saplings: false
  Toggle Default: true
  Initial Delay: false
Automatic Tree Destruction:
  Required Lore: ''
  When Sneaking: true
  Forced Removal: false
  Remove Leaves: true
  Initial Delay (seconds): 10
  Delay (ticks): 0
  Tree Types:
    Birch: true
    Jungle: true
    BigJungle: true
    BigSpruce: true
    Oak: true
    Spruce: true
    Brown Shroom: true
    Red Shroom: true
    Acacia: true
    Dark Oak: true
  Cooldown (seconds): 0
Auto Plant Dropped Saplings:
  Chance (percent): 10
  Delay (seconds): 5
Leaf Decay:
  Fast Leaf Decay: true
Sapling Replant:
  Command Time Delay (Seconds): 30
  Bottom Block has to be Broken First: true
  Time to Protect Sapling (Seconds): 0
  Replant When Tree Burns Down: true
  Block all breaking of Saplings: false
  Delay until Sapling is replanted (seconds) (minimum 1 second): 1
  Enforce: false
  Tree Types to Replant:
    Birch: true
    Jungle: true
    BigJungle: true
    Oak: true
    Spruce: true
    Brown Shroom: true
    Red Shroom: true
    Acacia: true
    Dark Oak: true
Tools:
  Sapling Replant Require Tools: true
  Tree Destruction Require Tools: true
  Tools List:
  - DIAMOND_AXE
  - WOOD_AXE
  - GOLD_AXE
  - IRON_AXE
  - STONE_AXE
  Drop Chance:
    DIAMOND_AXE: 100
    WOOD_AXE: 100
    GOLD_AXE: 100
    IRON_AXE: 100
    STONE_AXE: 100
Worlds:
  Enable Per World: false
  Enabled Worlds:
  - world
  - world2
Custom Drops:
  APPLE: 0.1
  GOLDEN_APPLE: 0.0
Placed Blocks:
  Handler Plugin Name: TreeAssist
Modding:
  Custom Logs:
  - -1
  Custom Tree Blocks:
  - -1
  Custom Saplings:
  - -1
Debug: none
Config Help: dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/tree-assist/pages/config-walkthrough/

replies.txt_content:
有种情况下看不掉 就是其他方块占了某棵树的方块 例如A树附近有棵B树 B树 生长后的树叶占到了A树的树叶
{:10_497:}呵呵

replies.author: 死ing
cs1000
replies.txt_content:
作死ing 发表于 2014-10-2 21:54
两个树在6x6范围叶子触碰后是不能砍断的

自己种树，自给自足的请把树木种子分开一点
那树得怎么种法呢 得空多少格子

replies.author: 死ing
replies.txt_content:

 蜡烛  树     蜡烛   空     空      空    蜡烛   树     蜡烛

空     空       空     空    空        空    空     空     空
